item.title: Report X-2024071681
item.description:
Report X-2024071681

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-26T18:15:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-18
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg is a case of four 1-gallon bottles bone decalcifier for medical laboratory use. Have loose caps, leaked. Caps not taped, liquids not bagged to prevent release. Relatively tall box unlikely to remain upright during transport and sortation.

item.title: Report X-2024071189
item.description:
Report X-2024071189

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-23T15:14:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-14
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box is marked with a corrosive diamond. The box contains 4X1gal bottles of Ecolab Ecotemp Phase 1 Detergent. The whole top of the box is wet from the leaking 1X1gal bottle of detergent. The cap is loose on 1 bottle and the seal under the cap is broken allowing it to leak. The others are soiled from the leakage.
